10.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF
10.description: Responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF from Main Controller

options.label: ALL ON is not active ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON active, ALL OFF active

40.label: Power reporting in watts on power change
40.description: Power consumption change threshold for sending updates

42.label: Power reporting in Watts by time interval

72.label: Slats tilting full turn time
72.description: Slat full turn time in tenths of a second.

options.label: ret. to previous position for Z-wave control only
return to previous position in all cases

74.label: Motor moving up/down time
74.description: Shutter motor moving time of complete opening or complete closing

76.label: Motor operation detection
76.description: Power threshold to be interpreted when motor reach the limit switch

78.label: Forced Shutter calibration
78.description: Enters calibration mode if set to 1

80.label: Reporting to Controller
80.description: Defines if reporting regarding power level, etc is reported to controller.

85.label: Power consumption max delay time
85.description: Time delay for detecting motor errors

90.label: Relay delay time
90.description: Defines the minimum time delay between next motor movement

110.label: Temperature sensor offset settings
110.description: Adds or removes an offset from the measured temperature.

120.label: Digital temperature sensor reporting
120.description: Threshold for sending temperature change reports
